SEARCH
Package org.example.model.chaosgame

Class ChaosCanvas

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.chaosgame.ChaosCanvas
public class ChaosCanvas extends Object

ChaosCanvas.

A class representing a canvas for the chaos game. It has methods for setting and getting pixels and for clearing the canvas.

The canvas has a toString method that returns a ascii representation of the canvas, and a getInfoString method that returns the details of the canvas.

Since:
0.2.0
Version:
1.0.0

    • ChaosCanvas

      public ChaosCanvas(int width, int height, Vector2D minCoords, Vector2D maxCoords)
      Constructor for ChaosCanvas, creates an object with the given width, height, minimum coordinates and maximum coordinates.
      Parameters:
      width - the width to use
      height - the height to use
      minCoords - the minimum coordinates to use
      maxCoords - the maximum coordinates to use
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given width or height is not positive, or if the given minimum or maximum coordinates are null

    • ChaosCanvas

      public ChaosCanvas(ChaosCanvas canvas)
      Deep copy constructor for ChaosCanvas class. Used to create a new ChaosCanvas with the same values as the given canvas.
      Parameters:
      canvas - the ChaosCanvas object to copy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given canvas is null

      Returns:

    • setPixelWithCoords

      public void setPixelWithCoords(Vector2D point)
      Sets the pixel value at the given point to 255. Does nothing if the point is not within the parameters.
      Parameters:
      point - the point to set the pixel value at

    • setPixelWithCoords

      public void setPixelWithCoords(Vector2D point, int value)
      Adds the given value to the current pixel value at the given point. Does nothing if the point is not within the parameters.
      Parameters:
      point - the point to set the pixel value at
      value - the value to add

    • setPixelWithPointOnCanvas

      public void setPixelWithPointOnCanvas(Vector2D point, int value)
      Puts the given value to the current pixel value at the given point in the canvas, does not transform the point.
      Parameters:
      point - the point to set the pixel value at
      value - the value to put
